data.chText: 滥用；妄用
data.enText: the use of sth in a way that is wrong or harmful

data.chText: 酗酒；嗜毒；嗜吸胶毒
data.enText: alcohol/drug/solvent abuse

data.chText: 他因被控贪污腐化和滥用职权而遭逮捕。
data.enText: He was arrested on charges of corruption and abuse of power .

data.chText: 支付现金红利制度可能被人钻空子。
data.enText: The system of paying cash bonuses is open to abuse (= might be used in the wrong way) .

data.chText: 她的所作所为是滥用经理职权。
data.enText: What she did was an abuse of her position as manager.

data.chText: 虐待
data.enText: unfair, cruel or violent treatment of sb

data.chText: 虐待儿童
data.enText: child abuse

data.chText: 性虐待
data.enText: sexual abuse

data.chText: 已举报的秘密警察虐待行为
data.enText: reported abuses by the secret police

data.chText: 她遭受了多年的肉体摧残。
data.enText: She suffered years of physical abuse.

data.chText: 辱骂；恶语
data.enText: rude and offensive remarks, usually made when sb is very angry

data.chText: 高声谩骂；破口大骂；大声辱骂
data.enText: to scream/hurl/shout abuse

data.chText: 不断辱骂；劈头盖脸一通臭骂
data.enText: a stream/torrent of abuse

data.chText: 滥用（以致危害健康）
data.enText: to make bad use of sth, or to use so much of sth that it harms your health

data.chText: 酗酒；嗜毒
data.enText: to abuse alcohol/drugs

data.chText: 他因吸服海洛因和可卡因一步一步地把身体搞垮了。
data.enText: He systematically abused his body with heroin and cocaine.

data.chText: 滥用，妄用（权力、所知所闻）
data.enText: to use power or knowledge unfairly or wrongly

data.chText: 她滥用自己作为校长的职权，把工作安排给朋友们。
data.enText: She abused her position as principal by giving jobs to her friends.

data.chText: 他觉得他们向报界透露有关他的情况是辜负了他的信任。
data.enText: He felt they had abused his trust by talking about him to the press (= tricked him, although he had trusted them) .

data.chText: 虐待；性虐待；伤害
data.enText: to treat a person or an animal in a cruel or violent way, especially sexually

data.chText: 所有这些儿童的身心都受到了摧残。
data.enText: All the children had been physically and emotionally abused.

data.chText: 他曾奸污了自己的亲生女儿。
data.enText: He had abused his own daughter (= had sex with her) .

data.chText: 这个男孩曾遭受过性虐待。
data.enText: The boy had been sexually abused.

data.chText: 辱骂；对…恶语相加；诋毁
data.enText: to make rude or offensive remarks to or about sb

data.chText: 裁判遭到了恐吓和谩骂。
data.enText: The referee had been threatened and abused.

data.chText: 嗜毒者
data.enText: a drug abuser

data.chText: 虐待儿童者
data.enText: a child abuser

simple_means.memory_skill: ab 相反 + use 用 → 不〔正常〕使用 → 滥用

means: 滥用，妄用(权力、所知所闻)

ex.chText: 他仔细阅读了说明书，这样就不会出现产品使用不当。
ex.enText: He has read the manual carefully so that the product won't be misapplied.

ex.chText: 你没发现规则被错用了吗？
ex.enText: Don't you realize that the rules have been misapplied?

synonyms.bx: 指对某物使用方法不当或误作他用，通常用被动语态。

ex.chText: 他滥用市长的权力，任用了不少朋友。
ex.enText: He abused his position as Mayor to give jobs to his friends.

ex.chText: 钻制度空子的人早晚会受到处罚。
ex.enText: People who abuse the system will be punished sooner or later.

ex.chText: 如果你只是酗酒而不采取行动，问题是不会解决的。
ex.enText: Your problems won't be resolved if you do nothing but abuse alcohol.

synonyms.bx: 指为了不正当的目的或谋取私利而滥用权力等，也指过量使用某物（如吸毒、酗酒等）而危害自身健康。

ex.chText: 这个术语为什么常常被误用？
ex.enText: Why is this term often misused?

ex.chText: 没有监管，裁判可能会滥用权力。
ex.enText: Without supervision, the judges might misuse their power.

synonyms.bx: 指将某物用于错误的目的或用法不当，常产生有害的结果。

example: the child showed signs of physical abuse

tr: a rude expression intended to offend or hurt
example: when a student made a stupid mistake he spared them no abuse
they yelled insults at the visiting team

tr: change the inherent purpose or function of something
example: The director of the factory misused the funds intended for the health care of his workers

tr: use wrongly or improperly or excessively
example: while she was pregnant, she abused drugs

tr: use foul or abusive language towards
example: The actress abused the policeman who gave her a parking ticket
The angry mother shouted at the teacher
She is always stepping on others to get ahead

value.boxr_value: The noun is pronounced /ə'bjuːs/. The verb is pronounced /ə'bjuːz/. 名词读作 /ə'bjuːs/。动词读作 /ə'bjuːz/。

value.def: Abuse of someone is cruel and violent treatment of them.

example.tran: 遭受性虐待及肉体摧残的受害者

gramarinfo.label: also N in pl, usu with supp

value.def: Abuse is extremely rude and insulting things that people say when they are angry.

example.ex: I was left shouting abuse as the car sped off...
example.tran: 汽车飞驰而去，留下我在那里大声咒骂。

example.ex: Raft repeatedly hurled verbal abuse at his co-star.
example.tran: 拉夫特不断地破口大骂和他联合主演的演员。

value.def: Abuse of something is the use of it in a wrong way or for a bad purpose.

example.ex: What went on here was an abuse of power.
example.tran: 这里所发生的事是一种滥用职权的行为。

value.def: If someone is abused, they are treated cruelly and violently.

example.ex: Janet had been abused by her father since she was eleven.
example.tran: 珍妮特从11岁起就遭受父亲虐待。

example.ex: ...parents who feel they cannot cope or might abuse their children.
example.tran: 认为自己应付不来或可能会虐待孩子的父母
从事帮助受虐儿童的工作的人们

value.def: You can say that someone is abused if extremely rude and insulting things are said to them.

example.ex: He alleged that he was verbally abused by other soldiers.
example.tran: 他宣称自己遭到其他士兵的辱骂。

value.def: If you abuse something, you use it in a wrong way or for a bad purpose.

example.ex: He showed how the rich and powerful can abuse their position.
example.tran: 他让我们看到有钱有势的人是如何滥用其地位的。

example.ex: ...the treatment of alcohol and drug abusers.
example.tran: 对酗酒和嗜毒者的治疗

trans: 物质滥用；滥用药物；滥用物质；滥用毒品；药物滥用

partsOfSpeech.dec: ab 相反 + use 用 → 反着用 → 滥用
ab 相反 + us 用 + ive …的，abuse的形容词 → 滥用的；谩骂的
dis 不 + abuse 滥用 → 不滥用 → 纠正错误
dis 不 + use 用 → 废弃；不用
mis 坏 + use 用 → 用的不对 → 错用
un 不 + usual 通常的 → 异乎寻常的
us 用 + age 表总称 → 用法；惯例
us 用 + ual 有…性质的 → 常用的 → 通常的
ut 用 + ensil 表物品 → 用的物品 → 用具
utilit〔y〕公用事业；有用 + arian …的 → 有用为主 → 功利主义的
util 用 + ity 具备某种性质，状况 → 公用事业；有用
util 用 + ize 使 → 利用
ab 相反 + normal 正常的 → 反常的
abs 相反 + ent 存在 → 不在 → 缺席的
abs 相反 + tain 拿住 → 不拿 → 戒绝
abs 相反 + tin 拿住 + ence 表状态 → 不让拿 → 节制；禁欲
abs 相反 + trus 推，冲 + e →〔思维〕冲不进 → 难懂的
ab 相反 + use 用 → 不〔正常〕使用 → 滥用
ab 去掉，离去 + dic 说话 + ate 使… → 离开说话的位置 → 退位
ab 去掉，离去 + duct 引导 → 引走 → 诱拐
ab 去掉，离去 + ject 扔 → 被人扔掉 → 可怜的
ab 去掉，离去 + jur 发誓 + e → 发誓离开 → 发誓，〔承诺〕放弃
ab 去掉，离去 + rad 擦 + e → 擦掉 → 磨损
ab 去掉，离去 + rog 要求 + ate 做，造成，使… → 要求离开 → 废除
ab 去掉，离去 + rupt 断 → 突然断开 → 突然的
abs 去掉，离去 + cis 切 + e → 切掉 → 切除
ab 去掉，离去 + sorb 吸收 → 吸收掉 → 吸收
abs 去掉，离去 + tract 拉 → 将[具体意义]抽走 → 抽象的
